guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: You can go with the black line and use a small amount of curl combined with some sidespin. You will need to use some backspin. From this side, you'll be using either a wood or a driver, depending on which tee you're playing from.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 149 540 C 191 343 191 343 189 183" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="149" cy="540" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="189" cy="183" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 144 604 C 191 343 191 343 189 183" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="144" cy="604" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="189" cy="183" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 140 669 C 191 343 191 343 189 183" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="140" cy="669" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="189" cy="183" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: If you have tailwind, this is the way to go. Use a wood with about 0.5 top spin to get it close. Just watch out for the rough and bunker in front.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 149 540 L 164 222" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="149" cy="540" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="164" cy="222" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 144 604 L 164 222" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="144" cy="604" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="164" cy="222" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 140 669 L 164 222" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="140" cy="669" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="164" cy="222" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: Yellow Path
guides.text: You'll need to use some curl and sidespin to get the ball close to the pin. It's recommended to only use this path if you get headwind mixed with some side wind coming from the left.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 149 540 C 105 365 105 365 139 186" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="149" cy="540" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="139" cy="186" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 144 604 C 105 365 105 365 139 186" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="144" cy="604" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="139" cy="186" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 140 669 C 105 365 105 365 139 186" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="140" cy="669" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="139" cy="186" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

annotations.name: Green
annotations.svg:
<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="177" cy="127" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 290 290 L 177 127" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/WinterLinks/annotations/1-Green.png" x="215" y="215" width="150" height="150" />
</g>

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the most common way to play the hole, out to the right. If you get a terrible headwind, bounce it before the rough over to the fairway. That will leave you with a wood to the green. Bounce it before the rough/bunker and be aware that it's uphill. Don't use that much backspin!

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 239 808 L 277 318" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 277 318 L 198 166" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 198 166 L 190 109" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="239" cy="808" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="277" cy="318" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="198" cy="166" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="190" cy="109" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 244 860 L 277 318" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 277 318 L 198 166" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 198 166 L 190 109" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="244" cy="860" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="277" cy="318" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="198" cy="166" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="190" cy="109" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 249 914 L 277 318" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 277 318 L 198 166" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 198 166 L 190 109" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="249" cy="914" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="277" cy="318" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="198" cy="166" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="190" cy="109" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: Take this route when you get a good tailwind. Go all in and get it to the big fairway after the rough. From there you should be able to use a short iron into the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 239 808 L 223 236" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 223 236 L 190 109" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="239" cy="808" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="223" cy="236" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="190" cy="109" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 244 860 L 223 236" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 223 236 L 190 109" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="244" cy="860" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="223" cy="236" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="190" cy="109" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 249 914 L 223 236" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 223 236 L 190 109" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="249" cy="914" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="223" cy="236" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="190" cy="109" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Yellow Path
guides.text: A tricky way to play but if you're accurate enough you can bounce it over to the next fairway on the left. If you go long into the rough, you'll still be able to get to the green on your 2nd shot. Don't use max topspin on your drive as the second fairway is a bit downhill.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 239 808 L 164 403" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 164 403 L 136 271" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 136 271 L 190 109" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="239" cy="808" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="164" cy="403" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="136" cy="271" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="190" cy="109" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 244 860 L 164 403" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 164 403 L 136 271" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 136 271 L 190 109" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="244" cy="860" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="164" cy="403" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="136" cy="271" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="190" cy="109" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 249 914 L 164 403" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 164 403 L 136 271" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 136 271 L 190 109" stroke="yellow" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="249" cy="914" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="164" cy="403" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="136" cy="271" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="190" cy="109" r="6" fill="yellow" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

annotations.name: Green
annotations.svg:
<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="200" cy="114" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 315 225 L 200 114" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/WinterLinks/annotations/2-Green.png" x="250" y="150" width="150" height="150" />
</g>

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: With tailwind you can bounce it over the creek from the fairway on the right with 4 - 5 bars of topspin. Be sure to get the second bounce in the rough so the ball will roll nicely onto the green for an easy putt. Some players will be able to play this way even with sidewind depending on the level of their driver.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 177 652 C 283 485 283 485 309 269" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 309 269 L 315 179" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 315 179 L 310 148" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="177" cy="652" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="309" cy="269" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="315" cy="179" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="310" cy="148" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 183 702 C 283 485 283 485 309 269" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 309 269 L 315 179" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 315 179 L 310 148" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="183" cy="702" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="309" cy="269" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="315" cy="179" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="310" cy="148" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 189 754 C 283 485 283 485 309 269" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 309 269 L 315 179" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 315 179 L 310 148" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="189" cy="754" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="309" cy="269" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="315" cy="179" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="310" cy="148" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: Without tailwind, this is the way to go. Get over to the fairway and leave yourself with a short iron for the eagle.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 177 652 L 213 243" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 213 243 L 310 148" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="177" cy="652" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="213" cy="243" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="310" cy="148" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 183 702 L 213 243" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 213 243 L 310 148" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="183" cy="702" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="213" cy="243" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="310" cy="148" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 189 754 L 213 243" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 213 243 L 310 148" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="189" cy="754" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="213" cy="243" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="310" cy="148" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

annotations.svg:
<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="283" cy="164" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 87 262 L 283 164" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/WinterLinks/annotations/3-Green.png" x="0" y="175" width="175" height="175" />
</g>

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This Par 3 is tricky because it's easy to get close but HARD to get an ace. The main adjustment is to go with 3 in topspin and 3 in LEFT sidespin. Combine that with a small amount of curl. That will get you on the right ball line to the pin and hopefully a hole in one.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 288 566 C 174 339 174 339 187 168" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="288" cy="566" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="187" cy="168" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 280 621 C 174 339 174 339 187 168" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="280" cy="621" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="187" cy="168" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 272 678 C 174 339 174 339 187 168" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="272" cy="678" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="187" cy="168" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

annotations.name: Green
annotations.svg:
<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="244" cy="146" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 87 87 L 244 146" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/WinterLinks/annotations/4-Green.png" x="0" y="0" width="175" height="175" />
</g>

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: On your drive, just avoid the bunker and rough on the left side. If you're using the Sniper, this path is the way to go for your 2nd shot. Go directly into the rough and let it roll out for a possible albatross.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 216 778 C 275 530 275 530 270 290" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 270 290 L 368 134" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="216" cy="778" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="270" cy="290" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="368" cy="134" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 231 825 C 275 530 275 530 270 290" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 270 290 L 368 134" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="231" cy="825" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="270" cy="290" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="368" cy="134" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 246 874 C 275 530 275 530 270 290" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 270 290 L 368 134" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="246" cy="874" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="270" cy="290" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="368" cy="134" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Red Path
guides.text: This is the suggested path when you're playing with the Guardian. Go directly onto the green with a good amount of backspin. Harder to albatross, but still an easy eagle.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 216 778 C 275 530 275 530 264 284" stroke="red" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 264 284 L 385 100" stroke="red" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="216" cy="778" r="6" fill="red" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="264" cy="284" r="6" fill="red" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="385" cy="100" r="6" fill="red" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 231 825 C 275 530 275 530 264 284" stroke="red" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 264 284 L 385 100" stroke="red" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="231" cy="825" r="6" fill="red" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="264" cy="284" r="6" fill="red" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="385" cy="100" r="6" fill="red" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 246 874 C 275 530 275 530 264 284" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 264 284 L 385 100" stroke="red" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="246" cy="874" r="6" fill="red" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="264" cy="284" r="6" fill="red" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="385" cy="100" r="6" fill="red" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

annotations.svg:
<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="356" cy="119" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 100 200 L 356 119" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/WinterLinks/annotations/5-Green.png" x="0" y="100" width="200" height="200" />
</g>

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the most common way to play the hole. Use 4 bars in topspin if you have tailwind, and max topspin if you have headwind. Land the second bounce in the rough close to the green and it will roll in nicely. Keep in mind this is a downhill teeshot so account for a little extra wind.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 196 602 L 151 252" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 151 252 L 156 130" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="196" cy="602" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="151" cy="252" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="156" cy="130" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 197 667 L 151 252" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 151 252 L 156 130" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="197" cy="667" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="151" cy="252" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="156" cy="130" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 197 734 L 151 252" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 151 252 L 156 130" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="197" cy="734" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="151" cy="252" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="156" cy="130" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: If your driver doesn't have much topspin you can overpower your shot and go directly into the rough. It will roll nicely out on the green.

<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="170" cy="110" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 287 237 L 170 110" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/WinterLinks/annotations/6-Green.png" x="200" y="150" width="175" height="175" />
</g>

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: Looking at this par 5 it may seem that you have 3 ways to play it but you'll only see 2 ways here because the 3rd way (off to the right) is so risky. You'll need a Titan on this hole to help yourself out. Use max sidespin combined with topspin and aim it at the sweet spot along the trees on the right. If you put your ball up close to the rough you'll need a wood club with a lot of curl. Use max curl, sidespin and 2 bars of topspin to get to the green and leave yourself a putt for eagle.

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: The drive here is the same as the black path. The only difference is to take your 2nd shot up over the trees if you come up a little short on your drive.

annotations.name: Green
annotations.svg:
<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="335" cy="103" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 87 122 L 335 103" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/WinterLinks/annotations/7-Green.png" x="0" y="45" width="175" height="175" />
</g>

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the normal way to play the hole. Use a decent amount of curl combined with max sidespin. With headwind, use 1 bar of backspin. With tailwind use 2 bars of backspin. Let it go up to the top and fall down to the pin for a possible hole in one.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 222 567 C 135 342 135 342 159 164" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="222" cy="567" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="159" cy="164" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 220 628 C 135 342 135 342 159 164" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="220" cy="628" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="159" cy="164" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.svg: <path d="M 216 690 C 135 342 135 342 159 164" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="216" cy="690" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="159" cy="164" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: Definitely a riskier way to play the hole. Curl it on the right side using 2 bars of topspin. You want to go up to the top of the green and let the ball fall back down.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 222 567 C 297 392 297 392 287 222" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="222" cy="567" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="287" cy="222" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

annotations.svg:
<g class="guide-image-annotation">
  <circle cx="210" cy="150" r="4" fill="white" />
  <path d="M 75 75 L 210 150" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3"/>
  <image xlink:href="/img/golfclash/courses/WinterLinks/annotations/8-Green.png" x="0" y="0" width="150" height="150" />
</g>

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a tricky Par 5. Skip the right side and NEVER play there. It may seem like a good option but your 2nd shot will be MUCH trickier even if your drive is perfect. Find the sweet spot on the small left fairway to bounce it over and between the 2 bunkers (Check Tommy's Video). From there you should be able to reach with your wood by bouncing over the rough and onto the green. If you can just get your ball onto the front edge, the green will let it roll down for an easy putt.
